about.title: Our Story
about.paragraph1: Dulci was born from a love for sweet moments that bring family and friends together. Every cake we make carries the mark of love, care, and tradition.
about.paragraph2: We use only the highest quality ingredients and proven recipes passed down through generations. Every dessert is a unique story, made especially for you.
about.value1_desc: Every cake is made with care and dedication, as if we're making it for our own family
about.value2_desc: We use only the finest ingredients and proven recipes
about.value3_desc: We preserve old recipes and combine them with modern trends

footer.description: Handmade cakes and pastries with love, for every special occasion. From our kitchen directly to your table.
